answerText: Miranda Gay [accept either part][10] Miranda appears in this author's collection of novels that includes Old Mortality, Noon Wine, and Pale Horse, Pale Rider.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 01 | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character is tended to by Dr. Hildesheim and Miss Tanner and enters a taxi with Mary at the end of the work in which she appears.  [10] Name this character who, with her lover, the reluctant soldier Adam, tries to remember the title spiritual of the work in which she appears as Adam dies of the flu.
